Actions.Name: Shadow Clone
Actions.Description: Summon a shadow clone in a free space in range.

Summons.Name: Shadow Clone
Summons.SummonEffects: Foes adjacent to a shadow clone at the start of their turn take 3 damage from the clone. The [name] and any of its allies may gain stealth if they end their turn adjacent to a clone. Clones disappear at the end of combat or if the [name] is defeated.

Actions.Name: Shadow Swap
Actions.Description: The [name] or an ally swaps places with a shadow clone in range 3 of them, teleporting.

Actions.Name: Shadow Play
Actions.Description: The [name] swaps the positions of two characters in range, teleporting them. Allies swapped gain stealth.
